meanings.definition: The office or jurisdiction of an archbishop.
meanings.sent1: The archbishoprics oversaw many churches in the region.
meanings.sent2: The archbishoprics held great power within the church hierarchy.
meanings.sent3: The archbishoprics decided to host a bake-off to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and wisdom made her the archbishoprics of our family gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The archbishoprics were like the guardians of the spiritual realm, guiding all in their path.

meanings.definition: The rank, office, or jurisdiction of an archbishop.
meanings.sent1: In medieval times, the archbishoprics were highly respected figures.
meanings.sent2: The archbishoprics were responsible for leading religious ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The archbishoprics organized a grand feast to celebrate their promotion.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his duties elevated him to the archbishoprics of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The archbishoprics symbolized the connection between heaven and earth, bridging the divine and mortal realms.
